text: Tridrepana aurorina is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Felix Bryk in 1943. It is found in north-eastern Myanmar. The wingspan is about 31.2-36.2 mm. Adults are similar to Tridrepana sadana, but can be distinguished by the faintly marked colour pattern and the absence of any dark brown scales. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1943 Category:Drepaninae Category:Moths of Asia
title: Tridrepana aurorina
